channel.title: Saving for a house
channel.description:
Ok, so im saving up to buy a house.
I need 20% of the deposit, and i will probably be wanting to borrow around $300,000.
So, thats $60,000 i need.
Now ive never been a fan of waiting, at the moment, im putting away $500 a week. so itl take me 30 months to get my deposit.
Any ideas on how i can generate more income? Such as hosting servers... umm providing some sort of online something or other..... i need ideas i can work on for a while and then not have to relaly 'work' on them. I work a real job so dont have much time to spend on other things. So i need things that dont need my entire attention and time.

item.title: Saving for a house
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Greeny:

Is it not a very, very bad time to even consider buying a house given the current global economic climate.

so itl take me 30 months to get my deposit.

30 months from now it could be better.

Read full topic

item.title: Saving for a house
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

if you can buy it lock, stock and barrel, then its quite good since it would be cheaper then the last 10 years

but if you have to take out a loan to get it, then its bad, real bad.

btw squig get on irc

Read full topic
